info.title: Customer Return - Simulate (A2X)
info.description: The API gives you information about the simulated returns order, such as header and item data, pricing, and business partners. The response is provided synchronously. The simulated returns order is not saved.

x-sap-shortText: Simulate the creation of a returns order with this synchronous OData API

values.text: [Customer Returns with Direct Shipment from Customer to Supplier(1Z3)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1Z3 " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Sales: Sales Document (SD_SALESDOC)
* Sales: Sales Document Item (SD_SALESDOCITEM)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

post.summary: Simulates the creation of a returns order.
post.description: Simulates the creation of the returns order with the correct information, such as the returns data, business partners, and pricing elements.

Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_CustomerReturnItemSimulation HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=66)

skip.name: $skip
